name: Teeny Viking Titans - Pixel cartoon battling and platform game
name_original: Teeny Viking Titans - Pixel cartoon battling and platform game
description:
"If you like old-school platformers, you will love this game"

Charming 8-bit graphics. Jump, run, fight enemies and solve amazing puzzles.

Help our teeny viking titan to find the runes and treasures into the dangerous caves.
